column4: Ok so I changed my GTK theme in ubuntu.  But now I cannot see some of the fonts inside webpages (firefox).  Is there any easy way to adjust this?
basically in firefox some of the fonts are white on white.  Cant see them.  Basically like when i am responding to a blog post, cant see the fonts I am typing at all
in firefox go to your preferences ->content tab and there is a Font & colors section
I know done tried it.  Oh well, guess I will just have to use the default theme.  No way to change it without screwing up fonts
